description: Enjoy lovely sweeping views of the Hudson River and Manhattan's west side from my 49th floor apartment 1 block from Times Square! Broadway Theatres, 4 different subway lines, shopping, and restaurants are all just steps outside. Full kitchen too!
name: Skyscraper Living in Midtown
review: El apartamento está fantásticamente situado. Bien amueblado y muy confortable. Inmejorable para pasar unos días recorriendo Manhattan. Repetiremos
